page.title: 11A DAY IN CARE_WELLBURY HOUSE
page.content: This is a record of a day in the life of a twelve year old boy in care. { A school day in a Boy's Community Home {6.30}I was woken by the night lady to get ready for my paper round. {6.40}I got dressed,had a wash ,cleaned my teeth and combed my hair. {6.50}Had a cup of coffee then got the key to the bike,and rode it up the lane to the village. {7.00}I collected the papers and delivered them all round Great Offley. {7.40}I arrived back at Wellbury. {7.50}Had breakfast of eggs and bacon. {9.15}We had a meeting then I went to school,which is in the grounds of the house. {9.20}Did Science and English in school {10.45}We had a tea break,then back to school,where I played on the computers {12.15}We had lunch which was pizza, mushrooms and potatoes.
